description: LoL What? I have never experienced such a fight to work with something as simple as a note app.. This was so hard to use. But it has major potential.
summary: Looks awesome, was really excited until I tried to use it.

description:
I like that aplication, i take all the notes for my classmates, i recommend for everyone. 

My linux distro its Fedora 31 with Gnome Shell 3.34.2

Its a dead link and I can't get it... source errors.

It is something I would really use ALLOT since I can't stand the complexity of MS Word, Libreoffice, Open Office, or any of that stuff. I like WYSIWYG document apps and not ones that try to read my mind and force me to undo most of what they do, taking longer to fix their nonsense than me doing it the "old fashioned" way.
I cant seem to find where it is saving. I would like to know where it is. I find myself having to export everything after creation just so I know where it is at.
Notes won't change notebook to notebook, name changes get undone. Etc
summary: Looks great, seems impossible to use

description: This app is nice and gets the job done, but it is very hard to use, like switching modes. the interface can be simplified. I am in fedora 33, I couldn't get it to create a new notebook or a section. Not sure if this is a bug, but UX can be improved a lot.

Following features would be handy

1. Sync both the edit and display window. 
2. The view window auto scrolls to top once there is some edit on the edit screen. Make it fixed or sync with the current editor

Otherwise the app looks decent.
summary: Good among other apps that I have used

description: It's baffling that there's no keyboard shortcut at all. And the preferences options is nothing but a joke.
cant even right a single north,ughhhhh!! trash!
UX is terrible. No disrespect to dev, the idea is pretty nice. But I couldn't even find how to create a notebook. Like what
summary: If you like to use it, prepare for a fight

description:
To be Honest, this is an amazing app for linux.
It may need some improvements but thats not gonna stop me [thanks notes-up creator]
---------------------------------------------------------

UX is kind of hard to understand initially but its totally worth it! (takes usually 5 minutes or more)
UI is cool and can be changed with system theme.
Organization system of notes is also nice
Tags, formatting and referencing is also good.

Création des notes très facile mais pour la suppression un simple bouton aurait été ! On ne voit pas intuitivement la petite croix qui se balade tout en bas de la liste des notes en cours ... De temps en temps plantage ...
summary: Suppression des notes difficiles , pas intuitive

description: C'est vraiment une excellente appli, une sauvegarde du fichier qui se fait automatiquement, sans avoir à cliquer sur "Enregistrer sous"... j'avoue que cela m'a surpris, mais alors où se trouve cette sauvegarde sur le disque dur ? Comment la récupérer en cas de soucis, de plantage du disque ?
Il manque une option indispensable, c'est la sauvegarde et la restauration des données
